title: Train Fault on Bukit Panjang LRT

title_translations.zh-Hans: 武吉班让轻轨列车故障
title_translations.ms: Kerosakan Kereta Api di LRT Bukit Panjang
title_translations.ta: புக்ிட் பாஞ்சாங் LRT இல் ரயில் பழுது

updates.text: [BPLRT] CLEARED: Train services between #ChoaChuKang and #BukitPanjang have resumed.
[BPLRT] CLEARED: Train services between #ChoaChuKang and #BukitPanjang resume progressively. Free bus bridging services between #ChoaChuKang and #BukitPanjang has ceased.
[BPLRT] CLEARED: Train services between #ChoaChuKang and #BukitPanjang is recovering progressively. Free bus bridging services between #ChoaChuKang and #BukitPanjang are available.

[BPLRT]: Due to a train fault, trains are moving slower between #ChoaChuKang and #BukitPanjang. We apologise for the inconvenience. Free bus briding services between #ChoaChuKang and #BukitPanjang are available.
